General.Name: Covivio Hotels
General.Description: Covivio Hotels specializes in owning operating premises in the hotel sector. A listed real estate investment company (SIIC), a real estate partner of major players in the hotel industry, Covivio Hotels has assets worth EUR 6.6 billion. Covivio Hotels is rated BBB+ / Stable outlook by Standard and Poor's.

4.Name: Mr. Marc  Henrion
4.Title: Member of the European Board and Managing Director of Foncière Europe Logistique

5.Name: Mr. Daniel  Frey
5.Title: Member of the European Board and Vice Chief Exec. Officer of Immeo Wohnen
